review: We have met the doctor, we went only for the consultation and it went very well, he explained very well and the doctor is also good, I'm satisfied with the consultation and waiting for the surgery treatment not yet done, we visited for knee replacement surgery consultation, he was listening there was some complications so he explained that and patient had some other problems also brain related so he referred us to Dr. Sita, his attitude and his behaviour is good he explain problem very well, I would like to recommend the doctor, they need to improve their hospital receptionist behaviour they don't talk to patients properly bit harsh behaviour that’s all remaining doctor is very good.

At first iam reluctant as I have been suffering from hip fracture and seemed to me that I have rely upon a walking stick all through the life, but as soon as I talked with Dr. Krishna Kiran he gave me assurance that I could walk on my own. Thanks to medicover and thanks to Dr. Krishna Kiran.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ***** ** * ******* ******* *** **** *** ******* *** ******** *** **** ***** * This doctor made the patient wait for 2 hours and after waiting for such longtime he checked  the MRI reports for 30sec and has not explained the root cause of the problem and next 30 sec he ****** said that the recovery time would be 6 weeks. So total 1 min time spent with the patient. He has not answered our queries and was constantly looking into his mobile, least bothered about the patient’s pain no empathy no friendly behaviour at all. I really had a very bad experience with this doctor this is completely my view. Experience may differ patient to patient.

I got my leg injured while playing badminton. when i visited him he declared it as fracture and gave me plaster for 21 days and after it he said its cured you can go home. I specifically asked him is any physiotherapy required then he said no. After 2 weeks again i visited him bcz my pain dint reduce. He said it happens it may get reduce in one month or one year or sometimes never. When i consulted other doctor he said it was normal muscle injury u never had a fracture. Same reply i got from 3 other doctors. They all suggested me for physiotherapy and i am feeling better after it. It would have been better earlier only if i wouldn't visited Krishna Kiran

I visited the doctor and the consultation experience was good. I am satisfied with doctor and doctor treatment. When it comes to improvement, everything was good. I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends. There was a 30-40 minutes waiting time to consult the doctor. His behaviour was good and listened to our problem.

I,K.Jayamani prasad expressing my experience about Dr.E.Krishna Kiran,I know very well since 10 yaers. I  have consulted about my severe both knee pains. He told me that you have required tkr in the year.2010. But I have neglected to go for knee replacement. He told me and frienfly convenienced for tkr. Finally I went to for tkr on 2016. Now my both knees are  very perfect. Now I am going to morning walk minimum 5kms. There is no pains so far. Thank you very much to Dr. Krishna Kiran garu

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was least bothered about my problem. He just wanted me to undergo different test ** ****** **** ***** Even the receptionist was rude and least bothered. They made us wait and when we went to the doctor, he just wrote diff test. He didn't bother to check everything in detail. We pay 600 first for consultation, so at least check for 5 mins at least. And to add on, the receptionist when asked about this, she was like, ok - will move you to other doctor. Meaning is this the way you treat your patients. Will never this hospital ever, nor would refer to anyone

He is no way concern about little kid problem. Just written the MRI. At the same time INR 3300 /- money was charged for xray too. **** *** ** ******** **** ** *** **** *** ****** ** ** ***** ************  Totally disappointed with his style of treating a 8 year old kid. ******* *** *** *********** *****.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: He diagnosed  the issue perfectly 5 star rating for him would recommend him for any orthopedic issue...
Didn't explain recovery period. Didn't explain the issue or suggest and treatment. Expected a better analysis.
